logic

Class DestroyersOfDungeons

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.DestroyersOfDungeons

  • public final class DestroyersOfDungeons
extends Object
    Main class for the game. Holds players and their deathtimes, the game map and handles the turns.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DestroyersOfDungeons()
      Creates a new instance of the game, and a new dungeon for it.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addPlayer(String name)
      Adds a new player to the game.
      List<Player> getAllOtherPlayers(Player me)
      Get all other players in the game, even the dead ones.
      Player getCurrentPlayer()
      Get the player currently in turn.
      Map<Player,Integer> getDeathTimes()
      Get the player death times.
      List<Tunnel> getMovingPossibilities()
      Gets the tunnel blocks next to current player's block.
      List<Player> getPlayers()
      Get the list of living players in the game.
      int getTotalTurns()
      Get the total amount of turns played.
      Player getWinner()
      Get the winning player.
      boolean lastMoveCreatedCollisions()
      Checks if the last move moved player to a block with other actors or items.
      void movePlayerTo(int to)
      Moves the player.
      void nextPlayer()
      Selects next player, and increments the turncounter if necessary.
      void removePlayer(Player p)
      Delets player from the game, and marks his death time.

      • getTotalTurns

        public int getTotalTurns()
        Get the total amount of turns played. A turn is passed when everyone has moved once.

        The total amount of turns played
